item.description:
We will have one or two sets of meetings next on Darwin's On the Origin of Species. This is a very large work, it isn't a philosophical text so we will read the following selection:

Introduction plus Chapters I through IV.
Optional: "An Historical Sketch" which precedes the Introduction in most editions.
item.how_to_find_us: Please send an e-mail to the organizer if you never have yet participated in skype calls with us.
item.name: Skype -- Darwin: On the Origin of Species
